chatbot.evidence: Limited menu and inability to assist with voucher refund
chatbot.description: The customer is frustrated with the chatbot Tobi as it has a limited menu and cannot assist with the voucher refund issue.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's menu options and ability to handle voucher refund requests.

complaint.description: The customer is complaining about the lack of customer service at Vodacom and the inability to report a faulty voucher and get a refund.
complaint.suggestion: Bring back human consultants for better customer service and provide a clear process for reporting and resolving issues with vouchers.

meta.review_title: Tobi  is frustrating bring back human consultants
meta.review_content: There is no more customer service at Vodacom,if you call you get Tobi virtual assistant whom is useless because it has limited menu.i bought a voucher at vodabucks store,the voucher is not working I don't know where to report it so I can get my refund,Tobi cannot assist,calling 135 you find Tobi,tried online chat the redirect me back to 135,I hate Tobi
